DOC.detailed_description: The aim study identify plasma metabolic profile associate childhood obesity phenotypes.. This cross-sectional study set-up examine metabolic profile fast plasma sample 65 overweight obese ( OB ) child 37 normal-weight ( NW ) control aged 8 18 year . The obtained plasma 1H-NMR spectrum rationally divide 110 integration region , represent metabolic phenotype . These integration region reflect relative metabolite concentration use statistical variable construct classification model discriminate OB NW child adolescent . In addition , two metabolic phenotype define within OB group , i.e . metabolically `` healthy '' obese ( MHO ) metabolically unhealthy obese ( MUO ) phenotype classify obese respectively , none ( MHO ) least two component ( MUO ) metabolic syndrome .
